description: {"blocks":[{"key":"55bgr","text":"This protocol can be used to extract High Molecular Weight gDNA from bacterial and archaeal cultures and cryo preservations thereof. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rs8a","text":"The resulting gDNA is usually suitable for long-read sequencing and is regularly used for genome assembly following Nanopore Sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmuhg","text":"It has been tested with a variety of mostly archaeal but also bacterial strains, including, but not limited to, Thermococcales, Thermotogales, E. coli, and Desulfurococcales.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":112,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":128,"length":13},{"style":"italic","offset":143,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":156,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
keywords: long-read sequencing, nanopore sequencing, gDNA, DNA extraction, HMW gDNA, HMW DNA,prokaryotic cells, archaea, bacteria
protocol_references:
{"blocks":[{"key":"1mohu","text":"This Protocol is partially based on methods from the following literature:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8nt8k","text":"
Murray, M. G. & Thompson, W. F. 1980. Rapid isolation of high molecular weight plant DNA. Nucleic Acids Research 8, 4321–4326.
Zhou, J., Bruns, M. A., & Tiedje, J. M. 1996. DNA recovery from soils of diverse composition. Appl and env microbiology 62(2):316-322.
Chen YY, Clancy KA, Burne RA. 1996. Streptococcus salivarius urease: genetic and biochemical characterization and expression in a dental plaque streptococcus. Infect Immun 64:585–592.
Wilson, K. 2001. Preparation of Genomic DNA from Bacteria. Current Protocols in Molecular Biology 56, 2.4.1-2.4.5.
Moissl-Eichinger, C. 2011. Archaea in artificial environments: their presence in global spacecraft clean rooms and impact on planetary protection. The ISME journal 5(2):209-219.
Baker, J. L. 2022. Using Nanopore Sequencing to Obtain Complete Bacterial Genomes from Saliva Samples. Msystems e00491-22.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Proteinase K, Molecular Biology Grade - 2 ml

status.info: We regularly use this protocol to extract gDNA suitable for Nanopore sequencing from archaea and bacteria

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ap6ks","text":"Transfer the bacteria-/archaea-suspension (~ ) from one cryo preservation capillary to a 1.5 mL reaction tube or pellet a well-grown culture by centrifugation   , discarding the supernatant, and resuspending the cell pellet in ~  media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":159,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":228,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8jnpm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"9A8C90901BE811EE9F4CB96A80685D3B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"15000","duration":900,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"94F746201BE811EE9F4CB96A80685D3B","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
